wiki.content:
The last track on the breakthrough album "Nevermind", the song was featured in the Sam Mendes' 2005 film, "Jarhead".
 
 The rumor that "Something In The Way" is about Kurt Cobain living under a bridge as a teenager is false. Kurt did live under a bridge, but this is not what "Something In The Way" is about. 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The last track on the breakthrough album "Nevermind", the song was featured in the Sam Mendes' 2005 film, "Jarhead".  The rumor that "Something In The Way" is about Kurt Cobain living under a bridge as a teenager is false. Kurt did live under a bridge, but this is not what "Something In The Way" is about.

track.name: Something in the Way
comments: the best song on the album!
It's bad to eat fish 'cause are my pets
underrated song from a popular album, it's a shame people don't point this song out when they talk about Nevermind, RIP Kurt.
the electric version of this is phenomenal
Timeless!
Haunting...

какой же у него здесь голос..
кайф!!
Pure Bliss, haunting throughout......Big love Kurt xxxxxx
1967 -forever
ominous
simple and effective
sad song
Their best track.
it's ok to eat fish cause they don't have any feelings!
kavajno!

something in the way mmmmm mmmm
